entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
